summary: An Ordinance rebating and refunding certain excessive assessments levied for the improvement of Twenty-seventh Avenue, et al, by constructing sewers therein, as provided by Ordinance No. 10079, creating Local Improvement District No. 853, and providing money from the general fund to make up the deficiency created by said rebates and refunds, and repealing Ordinance No. 13408, approved March 14, 1906.
